mapper.insert: insert into article values(article_seq.nextVal, 1, '0', sysdate, 0, #{writer_name}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content}, article_seq.nextVal, 1,#{lvl})
mapper.select: select * from article order by 1 desc
mapper.update: update article set title=#{title}, writer_name=#{writer_name}, posting_date=sysdate, content=#{content} where article_id=#{article_id}
update article set read_count=read_count+1 where article_id=#{article_id}
